verses.kjv: And there came one of the seven angels which had the seven vials, and talked with me, saying unto me, Come hither; I will shew unto thee the judgment of the great whore that sitteth upon many waters:
verses.web: One of the seven angels who had the seven bowls came and spoke with me, saying, “Come here. I will show you the judgment of the great prostitute who sits on many waters,
verses.ct: One of the 7 angels who had carried the 7 bowls came and spoke to me. "Come here," he said. "I will show you the judgment that is coming on the great prostitute who sits over many waters.

verses.kjv: With whom the kings of the earth have committed fornication, and the inhabitants of the earth have been made drunk with the wine of her fornication.
verses.web: with whom the kings of the earth committed sexual immorality. Those who dwell in the earth were made drunken with the wine of her sexual immorality.”
verses.ct: The kings of the earth have committed sexual immorality with her, and the people of the earth have gotten drunk on the wine of her immorality."

verses.kjv: So he carried me away in the spirit into the wilderness: and I saw a woman sit upon a scarlet coloured beast, full of names of blasphemy, having seven heads and ten horns.
verses.web: He carried me away in the Spirit into a wilderness. I saw a woman sitting on a scarlet-colored beast, full of blasphemous names, having seven heads and ten horns.
verses.ct: Then the angel carried me away in the spirit into a wilderness. There I saw a woman sitting on a scarlet beast that was covered with blasphemous names. The beast had 7 heads and 10 horns.

verses.kjv: And the woman was arrayed in purple and scarlet colour, and decked with gold and precious stones and pearls, having a golden cup in her hand full of abominations and filthiness of her fornication:
verses.web: The woman was dressed in purple and scarlet, and decked with gold and precious stones and pearls, having in her hand a golden cup full of abominations and the impurities of the sexual immorality of the earth.
verses.ct: The woman was dressed in purple and scarlet, dripping with gold, precious stones, and pearls. She held a golden cup in her hand, and it was filled with disgusting things — the filth of her sexual immorality.

verses.kjv: And upon her forehead was a name written, MYSTERY, BABYLON THE GREAT, THE MOTHER OF HARLOTS AND ABOMINATIONS OF THE EARTH.
verses.web: And on her forehead a name was written, “MYSTERY, BABYLON THE GREAT, THE MOTHER OF THE PROSTITUTES AND OF THE ABOMINATIONS OF THE EARTH.”
verses.ct: Written across her forehead was a name: MYSTERY, BABYLON THE GREAT, THE MOTHER OF PROSTITUTES AND OF THE ABOMINATIONS OF THE EARTH.

verses.kjv: And I saw the woman drunken with the blood of the saints, and with the blood of the martyrs of Jesus: and when I saw her, I wondered with great admiration.
verses.web: I saw the woman drunken with the blood of the saints, and with the blood of the martyrs of Jesus. When I saw her, I wondered with great amazement.
verses.ct: I could see that the woman was drunk — not on wine, but on the blood of God's holy people, the blood of those who had been martyred for Jesus. When I saw her, I was completely stunned.

verses.kjv: And the angel said unto me, Wherefore didst thou marvel? I will tell thee the mystery of the woman, and of the beast that carrieth her, which hath the seven heads and ten horns.
verses.web: The angel said to me, “Why do you wonder? I will tell you the mystery of the woman, and of the beast that carries her, which has the seven heads and the ten horns.
verses.ct: The angel said to me, "Why are you so amazed? I'll explain the mystery of the woman and the beast she rides — the one with 7 heads and 10 horns.

verses.kjv: The beast that thou sawest was, and is not; and shall ascend out of the bottomless pit, and go into perdition: and they that dwell on the earth shall wonder, whose names were not written in the book of life from the foundation of the world, when they behold the beast that was, and is not, and yet is.
verses.web: The beast that you saw was, and is not; and is about to come up out of the abyss and to go into destruction. Those who dwell on the earth and whose names have not been written in the book of life from the foundation of the world will marvel when they see that the beast was, and is not, and shall be present.
verses.ct: The beast you saw once existed, does not exist now, and is about to rise from the bottomless pit — only to go to its destruction. Everyone living on earth whose names have not been written in the book of life since the foundation of the world will be astonished when they see this beast that once was, then wasn't, and yet will appear again.

verses.kjv: And here is the mind which hath wisdom. The seven heads are seven mountains, on which the woman sitteth.
verses.web: Here is the mind that has wisdom. The seven heads are seven mountains on which the woman sits.
verses.ct: This calls for a mind with wisdom: the 7 heads represent 7 mountains on which the woman sits.

verses.kjv: And there are seven kings: five are fallen, and one is, and the other is not yet come; and when he cometh, he must continue a short space.
verses.web: They are seven kings. Five have fallen, the one is, the other has not yet come. When he comes, he must continue a little while.
verses.ct: They also represent 7 kings. 5 have already fallen, 1 is reigning now, and the last has not yet come. When he does arrive, he will rule for only a short time.

verses.kjv: And the beast that was, and is not, even he is the eighth, and is of the seven, and goeth into perdition.
verses.web: The beast that was, and is not, is himself also an eighth, and is of the seven; and he goes to destruction.
verses.ct: The beast that once existed but doesn't now — he is an 8th king, but he belongs to the 7, and he is headed for destruction.

verses.kjv: And the ten horns which thou sawest are ten kings, which have received no kingdom as yet; but receive power as kings one hour with the beast.
verses.web: The ten horns that you saw are ten kings who have received no kingdom as yet, but they receive authority as kings with the beast for one hour.
verses.ct: The 10 horns you saw are 10 kings who haven't received their kingdoms yet. But they will be given authority to rule alongside the beast for one hour.

verses.kjv: These have one mind, and shall give their power and strength unto the beast.
verses.web: These have one mind, and they give their power and authority to the beast.
verses.ct: These kings are united in purpose, and they will hand over all their power and authority to the beast.

verses.kjv: These shall make war with the Lamb, and the Lamb shall overcome them: for he is Lord of lords, and King of kings: and they that are with him are called, and chosen, and faithful.
verses.web: These will war against the Lamb, and the Lamb will overcome them, for he is Lord of lords, and King of kings, and those who are with him are called chosen and faithful.”
verses.ct: They will wage war against the Lamb, but the Lamb will defeat them — because he is Lord of lords and King of kings. And those who stand with him are the called, the chosen, and the faithful."

verses.kjv: And he saith unto me, The waters which thou sawest, where the whore sitteth, are peoples, and multitudes, and nations, and tongues.
verses.web: He said to me, “The waters which you saw, where the prostitute sits, are peoples, multitudes, nations, and languages.
verses.ct: Then the angel said to me, "The waters you saw, where the prostitute sits, represent peoples, crowds, nations, and languages.

verses.kjv: And the ten horns which thou sawest upon the beast, these shall hate the whore, and shall make her desolate and naked, and shall eat her flesh, and burn her with fire.
verses.web: The ten horns which you saw, and the beast, these will hate the prostitute, will make her desolate, will strip her naked, will eat her flesh, and will burn her utterly with fire.
verses.ct: The 10 horns you saw, along with the beast, will turn against the prostitute. They will strip her bare, leave her desolate, devour her flesh, and burn her with fire.

verses.kjv: For God hath put in their hearts to fulfil his will, and to agree, and give their kingdom unto the beast, until the words of God shall be fulfilled.
verses.web: For God has put in their hearts to do what he has in mind, to be of one mind, and to give their kingdom to the beast, until the words of God should be accomplished.
verses.ct: God himself has put it into their hearts to carry out his purpose. He made them agree to hand their kingdoms over to the beast until every word God has spoken is fulfilled.

verses.kjv: And the woman which thou sawest is that great city, which reigneth over the kings of the earth.
verses.web: The woman whom you saw is the great city, which reigns over the kings of the earth.”
verses.ct: The woman you saw is the great city that rules over the kings of the earth."
